languages.text: {n}Лицо астропата кривится, будто вы поймали его на чем-то постыдном.{/n} "Прошу простить, Ваша Светлость. Это... привычка. Клянусь, я больше не потревожу покой ваших мыслей без разрешения".

traits.locale_text: {n}Лицо астропата кривится, будто вы поймали его на чем-то постыдном.{/n} "Прошу простить, Ваша Светлость. Это... привычка. Клянусь, я больше не потревожу покой ваших мыслей без разрешения".

languages.text: {n}The Choirmaster makes a wry face, as though you have caught him doing something reprehensible.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was... force of habit. I swear I will never again intrude upon your mind's peace without permission."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо астропата кривится, будто вы поймали его на чем-то постыдном.{/n} "Прошу простить, Ваша Светлость. Это... привычка. Клянусь, я больше не потревожу покой ваших мыслей без разрешения".

traits.locale_text: {n}The astropath makes a wry face, as though you've caught him doing something reprehensible.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was... force of habit. I swear I will never again intrude upon your mind's peace without permission."

{n}The astropath makes a wry face, as though you've caught him doing something reprehensible.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was... force of habit. I swear I will never again intrude upon your mind's peace without permission."

{n}The astropath makes a wry face, as though you've caught him doing something reprehensible.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was... force of habit. I swear I will never again intrude upon your mind's peace without permission."

{n}The astropath makes a wry face, as though you've caught him doing something reprehensible.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was... force of habit. I swear I will never again intrude upon your mind's peace without permission."

{n}The Choirmaster makes a wry face, as though you have caught him doing something reprehensible.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was... force of habit. I swear I will never again intrude upon your mind's peace without permission."

{n}The Choirmaster makes a wry face, as though you have caught him doing something reprehensible.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was... force of habit. I swear I will never again intrude upon your mind's peace without permission."

languages.text: {n}El maestro del Coro tuerce el gesto, como si le hubieras encontrado haciendo algo reprensible.{/n} «Mis disculpas, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Ha sido... la costumbre. Juro no volver a perturbar la paz de su mente sin permiso».
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster makes a wry face, as though you have caught him doing something reprehensible.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was... force of habit. I swear I will never again intrude upon your mind's peace without permission."

traits.locale_text: {n}El maestro del Coro tuerce el gesto, como si le hubieras encontrado haciendo algo reprensible.{/n} «Mis disculpas, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Ha sido... la costumbre. Juro no volver a perturbar la paz de su mente sin permiso».

languages.text: {n}クワイアーマスターは、何かよからぬ行為がバレてしまったかのように顔をしかめる。{/n}「お許しください、陛下。つい…癖が出てしまった。二度と、許可もなくあなたの心の平穏を乱さないと誓う」
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster makes a wry face, as though you have caught him doing something reprehensible.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was... force of habit. I swear I will never again intrude upon your mind's peace without permission."

traits.locale_text: {n}クワイアーマスターは、何かよからぬ行為がバレてしまったかのように顔をしかめる。{/n}「お許しください、陛下。つい…癖が出てしまった。二度と、許可もなくあなたの心の平穏を乱さないと誓う」

languages.text: {n}唱诗大师苦笑起来，仿佛是做坏事被你抓了现行一样。{/n}“我很抱歉，大人。我这么做是出于……习惯。我向您发誓，以后未经您允许的情况下，我绝对不会打扰您心灵的安宁。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster makes a wry face, as though you have caught him doing something reprehensible.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was... force of habit. I swear I will never again intrude upon your mind's peace without permission."

traits.locale_text: {n}唱诗大师苦笑起来，仿佛是做坏事被你抓了现行一样。{/n}“我很抱歉，大人。我这么做是出于……习惯。我向您发誓，以后未经您允许的情况下，我绝对不会打扰您心灵的安宁。”

languages.text: {n}Der Chormeister grinst leicht, als hättest du ihn bei etwas Verwerflichem ertappt.{/n} "Verzeiht, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Es war ... Gewohnheit. Ich schwöre, ich werde Euch nie wieder ohne Erlaubnis stören."
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster makes a wry face, as though you have caught him doing something reprehensible.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was... force of habit. I swear I will never again intrude upon your mind's peace without permission."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Chormeister grinst leicht, als hättest du ihn bei etwas Verwerflichem ertappt.{/n} "Verzeiht, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Es war ... Gewohnheit. Ich schwöre, ich werde Euch nie wieder ohne Erlaubnis stören."

languages.text: {n}Le maître de chœur esquisse un sourire en coin, comme si vous l'aviez surpris la main dans le sac.{/n} « Veuillez m'excuser, Votre Seigneurie. Les vieilles habitudes ont la vie dure. Je vous jure de ne plus jamais m'immiscer dans votre esprit sans votre permission. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster makes a wry face, as though you have caught him doing something reprehensible.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was... force of habit. I swear I will never again intrude upon your mind's peace without permission."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le maître de chœur esquisse un sourire en coin, comme si vous l'aviez surpris la main dans le sac.{/n} « Veuillez m'excuser, Votre Seigneurie. Les vieilles habitudes ont la vie dure. Je vous jure de ne plus jamais m'immiscer dans votre esprit sans votre permission. »

languages.text: {n}Koro Şefi, onu ayıp bir şey yaparken yakalamışsın misali yüzünü ekşitiyor.{/n} "Özürlerimi sunuyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bende... Alışkanlık olmuş. Bir daha müsaadeniz olmadan zihninizin huzurunu bozmayacağıma yemin ederim."
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster makes a wry face, as though you have caught him doing something reprehensible.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It was... force of habit. I swear I will never again intrude upon your mind's peace without permission."
